Description: The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (Environment.OSVersion.Platform)              {                  case PlatformID.Win32NT:                  case PlatformID.Win32S:                  case PlatformID.Win32Windows:                      SetDllDirectory(path);                      break;                  case PlatformID.Unix:                  case PlatformID.MacOSX:                      string currentValue = Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable(LD_LIBRARY_PATH) ?? string.Empty;                      string newValue = string.IsNullOrEmpty(currentValue) ? path : currentValue + Path.PathSeparator + path;                      Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable(LD_LIBRARY_PATH' newValue);                      break;              }
